column1: WOW! Unbelievable!  Over 1 million potentially infected by Coronavirus in China. Wow. Keep praying! https://twitter.com/BeholdIsrael/status/1226486213273640960 …

Don’t panic but it’s okay to be on the safe side and take precautions as relates to coronavirus..especially if you have kids. 

We can assume a lot of things and we can assume this is a deep state panic push (I believe that is the case) but coronavirus is real. I have kids.
